summary: AN ORDINANCE Relating to land use and zoning, amending the Official Land Use Map, Seattle Municipal Code Chapter 23.32, to approve boundaries for the Station Area Overlay District; amending Seattle Municipal Code Sections 23.34.008, 23.34.024, 23.47.004, 23.47.008, 23.47.009, 23.47.040; repealing Chapter 23.70; and adding a new Section 23.34.089 and a new Chapter 23.70, Station Area Overlay District, to the Seattle Municipal Code; to establish permanent regulations to prohibit uses incompatible with transit-oriented development and revise development standards within approximately one-quarter mile of Sound Transit light rail stations.
